net.cloud.server.game

Class DisconnectedPlayerMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.game.DisconnectedPlayerMap

  • public class DisconnectedPlayerMap
extends Object
    Similar to the WorldPlayerMap, this serves as a temporary storage location for players that have disconnected and still have a chance to reconnect. Players are stored with their username as a key, instead of the Channel they connected with.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int INITIAL_CAPACITY
      Initial capacity of the map.
      private static float LOAD_FACTOR
      Density of the map.
      private static int MAP_SHARDS
      Essentially how many threads can concurrently access map.
      private static long PARALLELISM_THRESHOLD
      How many players should be online before bulk actions become parallel
      private ConcurrentHashMap<String,Player> players
      Stores a mapping from the channel the player is connected with to the player itself

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisconnectedPlayerMap()
      Creates a new map ready to put players in.

    • Method Summary

    • Field Detail

      • INITIAL_CAPACITY

        private static final int INITIAL_CAPACITY
        Initial capacity of the map. Low-ball how many players are expected in here
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOAD_FACTOR

        private static final float LOAD_FACTOR
        Density of the map. Higher for less overhead, but not too high
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAP_SHARDS

        private static final int MAP_SHARDS
        Essentially how many threads can concurrently access map. Keep as low as possible.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARALLELISM_THRESHOLD

        private static final long PARALLELISM_THRESHOLD
        How many players should be online before bulk actions become parallel
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • players

        private ConcurrentHashMap<String,Player> players
        Stores a mapping from the channel the player is connected with to the player itself

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisconnectedPlayerMap

        public DisconnectedPlayerMap()
        Creates a new map ready to put players in.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Player get(String username)
        Look for a player in the map
        Parameters:
        username - The player's username
        Returns:
        The player, or null if they were not in the map

      • place

        public void place(Player player)
        Put a player in the map. Their username is used as the key.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that has disconnected

      • remove

        public Player remove(String username)
        Remove the player with the given username from the map
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the player
        Returns:
        The player that was removed, or null if the player was not in the map

      • forAll

        public void forAll(Consumer<Player> action)
        Do the given action for all players in the map.
        Parameters:
        action - What to do with each Player
